info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:51PM EDT until July 29 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FULTON AND EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 150 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tribes Hill, or over Fonda, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Amsterdam, Gloversville, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Fort Johnson, Tribes Hill, Perth, Berkshire, Auriesville, West Perth, Hoeseville, Steele Corners, Church Corners, Honeywell Corners, Stairs Corners, Hale Mills, Vail Mills, West Galway, Rockton and Beyers Corners. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
